text: The student will model how a computing system works including input and output, processors, and sensors.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

text: The student will identify, using accurate terminology, simple hardware and softwareproblems that may occur during use, and apply strategies for solving problems (e.g.,rebooting the device, checking for power, checking for network availability, closingand reopening an app).
subject: Computer Science (2017)
